exceptions.tactic: unfold send_safe; unfold send_step; split; intros H; destruct H as [b [pf pf']]; exists b; exists pf; apply pf'.
exceptions.exn: In environment Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this, to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat b : Hn this to pf : coh d pf' : prec (getSt this pf) to msg The term "b" has type "this \\in nodes /\\ to \\in nodes" while it is expected to have type "UMC.sort heapUMC".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Data: Type

serialize: Data -> seq nat

ds_inverse: left_inverse serialize deserialize

prec: qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop
psafe: prec_safe
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
msg: seq nat

Goal:
send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heapUMC) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step pf = Some b)

Premises:

heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (dynamic id)

cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize stag : nat prec : qstate -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop psafe : prec_safe this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- Type]

Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (Protocols.Exports.coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.Exports.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
trans_updDom : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> coh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
cohSt : forall (n : nid) (d : dstatelet), coh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = qstate
receive_step_fun = fun (q : qstate) (from : nid) (tag rid : nat) => let '(xs, ys) := q in if (tag == treq) && ((from, rid) \notin ys) then (xs, (from, rid) :: ys) else if (tag == tresp) && ((from, rid) \in xs) then (seq.rem (from, rid) xs, ys) else q : qstate -> nid -> nat -> nat -> reqs * seq (nid * nat) Arguments receive_step_fun _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope

zip_unitE : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (zip_f : V -> V -> option V) (unit_f : V -> V) (unitL : forall x : V, zip_f (unit_f x) x = Some x), (forall x y : V, (exists z : V, zip_f x y = Some z) <-> unit_f x = unit_f y) -> forall f1 f2 : finMap K V, (exists f : finMap K V, zip zip_f f1 f2 = Some f) < -> zip_unit unitL f1 = zip_unit unitL f2
send_step_fun = fun (q : qstate) (to : nid) (tag rid : nat) => let '(xs, ys) := q in if tag == treq then ((to, fresh_id xs) :: xs, ys) else if (tag == tresp) && ((to, rid) \in ys) then (xs, seq.rem (to, rid) ys) else q : qstate -> nid -> nat -> nat -> qstate Arguments send_step_fun _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope
fresh_id = fun xs : seq (nid * nat) => (last 0 (sort oleq (unzip2 xs))).+1 : seq (nid * nat) -> nat Arguments fresh_id _%seq_scope
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0 | _ :: s' => (size s').+1 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Arguments size {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
